attributes.additional_details:
MPs individual salaries are £77,379 each.
Ministers earn more on top - but they can be sacked between elections.
attributes.background: MPs are being paid for failure with the Brexit situation. They are paid much more than ordinary people. Reducing their salary for this failure is fair and will put them more in touch with ordinary voters. It will also save the UK taxpayer over £25 million per year.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
